meanings.sent1: The bichromated paper turned a deep red color.
meanings.sent2: The artist used bichromated film to create unique photographs.
meanings.sent3: The bichromated glass seemed to glow under the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bichromated as a sunset sky.
meanings.sent5: The bichromated metal reflected light in a dazzling way.

meanings.definition: Having undergone a process involving bichromate.
meanings.sent1: The bichromated fabric had a distinct texture.
meanings.sent2: The bichromated wood had a rich, dark finish.
meanings.sent3: The bichromated cake tasted surprisingly sweet.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as bichromated as a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The bichromated sculpture captured the essence of movement.
